message: Hello Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, even more so than it is to me. I'm willing to part with it for $1,150,000. This is a fair starting point considering its potential worth to your business.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to pay closer to $1,000,000. This product is valuable to me, but I need to stay within my budget.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.
Bob, I understand your position on the budget. However, the value this product brings to the table is significant. Let's meet halfway - I can do $1,075,000. This is my final offer.
